pa: Uh, I wanted to rent a room.

en: Ja powiedziałem lipiec, chodziło mi o sierpień.

You'll make a lot of money before he's old enough to even catch on.

There's this thing called…
 fuzzy impressions.

 những ấn tượng mơ hồ.

en: Termometry w Sopocie pokazują 38 stopni w cieniu.
pa:
Even temperatures at the beach have escalated
 to over 100 degrees in the shade.

pa: Everyone is trying their best to avoid the sunlight
vi: Hãy trốn ánh mặt trời và đợi cơn mưa đến.

en: chowamy się przed słońcem i czekamy na deszcz.
Od trzech tygodni na Pomorzu nie spadła ani jedna kropla.

and wait for the rain to finally fall.
 We haven't had a single drop here in the region for at least three weeks.

Hai người hiểu rõ nhau nhỉ?

pa: I guess, uh, she knows me well, but I don't really know her.
vi: Ý tôi là, cô ấy hiểu rõ tôi. Không chắc tôi có biết rõ cô ấy không.

en: Mówiła, że pani jest bardzo szczera.
pa: She said that you were very honest.

pa: So a translator of French literature.

pa: No. She's not looking for work.
vi: Không. Bà ấy còn chẳng thèm tìm việc.

pa: And what is it that you think?

en: Ja to się chyba nie umiem obrażać.
pa: I don't think I could actually hold a grudge.

en: Ojciec zmarł, jak pani miała dwa lata?
pa: Your father died when you were very young?

pa: Your mother tell you how he died?

pa: -He had a heart attack. -No, about what caused it?

en: Po wyjściu z więzienia był bardzo słaby.

vi: Sau khi ra tù, ông ấy rất yếu.

pa: How did he end up there?

en: A to pan nie wie takich rzeczy?

en: pani wierzy w to, co matka mówi?

pa: Thank you. I feel much better.

Sườn lợn với salad dưa chuột.

all year long.

To od razu chciałam iść z nim do łóżka.

vi: con đã muốn lên giường ngay với anh ấy.

Thế nào?
 Con hòa nhập được chứ?

en: Michał. To jest taki test, wiesz.

vi: Michał. Đó là một phép thử.

en: Czy jest sens poznawać kogoś bliżej.
pa: To see if there's any point in getting closer.
vi: Xem có đáng tìm hiểu một người không.

pa: I was waiting for you to wake up.

Have you made your decision?
 Decision?

Cô quyết định chưa?

- Dobrze. A wie pani, co to oznacza? - Nie wiem.

vi: - Rồi. Và cô biết nó nghĩa là gì chứ? - Không biết.

en: W ogóle mnie to teraz nie obchodzi.
pa: And right now, I don't care.
vi: Giờ tôi chả quan tâm nữa.
Bất cứ gì cũng tốt hơn…

en: co ja się będę produkować, pan pewnie wszystko o mnie wie.
pa: why go on? I'm sure you already know everything.
vi: Giải thích cũng vô ích. Anh biết mọi thứ về tôi.

en: W dupie mam, jak to się skończy.
pa: I don't give a shit how it ends.
vi: Tôi mặc kệ nó kết thúc thế nào.
Sẽ có người gọi cho cô.

So what?
 I mean, did you like it?
Is this advice or an assignment?

pa: -So it is an assignment. -Your choice, as always.

en: A jak nie pojedziesz, to pomyślę, że ci się podoba.
pa: But if you don't go, I'll start to think you like him.

You missed a spot over there.
